followUpQuestions.question: What warning lights and indicators are lighted on your dashboard?

noPower.solution: Your car has Loose cable connection, Bad fuse box, or Bad ground wire. Contact our experts to troubleshoot.

engineLight.solution: Your engine may have issues. We suggest checking your carâ€™s engine oil and scheduling a service with our experts.

batteryLight.solution: The battery may need replacement or charging. Contact our team for further assistance.

gasLight.solution: Your Fuel level may be low. Please check the Fuel level or visit a service center for further diagnostics.

coolantLight.solution: Your Coolant temperature may be hight. Please turn off the car and stay away from the car until it cools down, and contact a service center for further diagnostics.
